TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit RouteBuilderExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a way to add MVC routes for a given feature.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.IRouteBuilder MapRouteForFeature (this Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.IRouteBuilder routeBuilder, string featureName, string name, string template, object defaults, object constraints, object dataTokens);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.IRouteBuilder MapRouteForFeature(class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.IRouteBuilder routeBuilder, string featureName, string name, string template, object defaults, object constraints, object dataTokens) cil managed

<Extension()> Public Function MapRouteForFeature (routeBuilder As IRouteBuilder, featureName As String, name As String, template As String, defaults As Object, constraints As Object, dataTokens As Object) As IRouteBuilder
static member MapRouteForFeature : Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.IRouteBuilder * string * string * string * obj * obj * obj -> Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.IRouteBuilder
MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.FeatureManagement.RouteBuilderExtensions.MapRouteForFeature (routeBuilder, featureName, name, template, defaults, constraints, dataTokens)

Docs.param: The to add the route to.
The feature requried to activate the rout.
The URL pattern of the route.
An object that contains default values for route parameters. The object's properties represent the names and values of the default values.
An object that contains constraints for the route. The object's properties represent the names and values of the constraints.
An object that contains data tokens for the route. The object's properties represent the names and values of the data tokens.
Docs.summary: Maps an MVC route that is only used if the given feature is enabled.
Docs.returns: A reference to this instance after the operation has completed.
